QuestData.Title: Therapy
QuestData.Description: Trolls... me hates 'em all! <Harkor spits.>$b$bI once got meself captured by a band o' tha beasts... came this close ta gettin' me head shrunk!$b$bMe friends tell me to just move on and put it all behind me, but that just ain't sittin' right.$b$bWanna know what would make me feel better, $r? Seein' a pile of their corpses so high it blots out the sun! I've got good gold to spend if ya can make that happen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Harkor at Harkor's Camp wants you to kill 10 Drakkari Protectors and 10 Drakkari Oracles outside Drakil'jin Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: Thankyeh, $c.$b$bWhen time allows I'll git up and have meself a look around.
